subject: College Athletics
Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mr. Smith’s strategies enlivened the offenses at U.C.L.A., Alabama and Arizona, and he was the coach at Army in the difficult years at the end of the Vietnam War.
snippet: Mr. Smith’s strategies enlivened the offenses at U.C.L.A., Alabama and Arizona, and he was the coach at Army in the difficult years at the end of the Vietnam War.
